::Hunter::

"By the Matrix, I think Unicron sat on me," a bot groans as he sits 
up. He was charred and covered with dirt, but internal repairs had 
mostly healed him. He had crashed earlier on the planet after 
following Killfest through a transwarp portal.

"Where the slag am I?" he asks himself, not remembering anything that 
happened since the crash for a few seconds. He had landed and had 
apprehended a Predacon ship, but an explosion had sent him into 
stasis lock.

He looks around. Unknown to him, he wasn't too far away from 
Destructor's cloaked base. Checking his scanners, he sees that a 
Predacon was on his way here.

"Well well well, some action..." he says, arming a mean-looking rifle.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Still nervously clanking his claws Scorponok tries to calm 
himself, "The
> alliance?" he says. Then after he's reained his composure he 
screams.
> "Scorponok, Terrorize" with that the scorpion changes to robot 
mode. He
> puts his foot in the water then walks all the way in until he is 
sumberged
> and starts following his radar towards london Island.
